C65762653,"1. Login to omnia with valid credentials
Place a bet and translate it by choosing the odds as Manual Price

3. After bet translated > Go To Completed Translations Tab  and verify the previously placed bet (Slip status Translated)
4. Settle the bet and again find the slip in completed translations
(Slip status Settled) click the bet
5. Dip slip for payout after settlement","Scenario: Verify if Manual prices taken by user were displaying in Bright orange color in all 3 screens

Then I verify odds color is Orange"

C65783201,"1. Strike a bet in Omnia for Any Amount
2. Go to Translations and select your bet
3. Enter the stake and Press F9
4. Scroll to greyhounds and choose 3 different races and input 1+2+3 as your selections and press enter
5. Choose Tricast
6. Repeat step 1, 2 and 3 from above
7. Scroll to greyhounds and select 2 races and enter numbers 1&2 as your selections

8. Go to edit pencil and choose number 3 for your chosen races and enter then to the betslip","Scenario: 18933 Production Bug - Translate a Tricast Bet for multiple Greyhound Events from the Race Table

C66164840,"1. Place a bet, translate it and manually settle for any amount
2. Dip the slip for payout and confirm
3. Now go to completed translations and select your bet
4. Go to the pencil icon and select
5. Amend the amount to a higher amount
i.e in my case it was a 100 so amended to 120 and confirm
6. Now go back to completed translations and look at your bet","Scenario:OMNIA - 5618 - Completed Translation - displays incorrect returns for payment amounts that have been amended

C66173294,"1. Log onto OMNIA make note of the number slips in awaiting translations (green pin next to translation tab) and place an OTC bet.
2. Please make sure the number of slips in awaiting translations in increased by 1
3. Navigate to completed translations page.
4. Now translate the bet and settle it for 10K+ (So that a large win interaction pop up is generated during payout)
5. Payout the bet.
6. Select log now in the large win interaction pop up.","Scenario: OMNIA-6357 : Green Pin (Translations Number Count) Disappearing - Translations Tab

C60329960,"1. Prepare a £1 win lucky 15 bet using a selection from any 2 horse races and then a selection that you repeat in the bet slip as a numbered and named selection write the current odds on the named selection only, and accept the bet for £15

3. Select the bet you accepted to proceed

C65739096,"1. Accept a bet of any stake, locate the bet in Awaiting Translations and then Tab across to Time/Location and enter the time or meeting name of a Horse event

4. Check the Selection box should be clear - No dropdown list of selections from this race should now be visible
5. Tab 4 times to go through -
Time/Location
Green Arrow
Sport
and then back to Time/Location

C1106696,"1. In Omnia, scan through a plain slip > enter 8.00 stake > Confirm
Note: stake may not be correct as it depends on amount of races left TTC, but that is fine
2. Navigate to Translations, locate the bet and re-enter the stake
3. Press F9 on the keyboard
4. Using the arrows on the keyboard, scroll up to a horse meeting name and press the space bar on the meeting name
5. With the Selection box now highlighted, press 1 on the keyboard and then enter twice
6. Press F12 on the keyboard > enter on Win > use the arrows to find Single and press enter
7. Press enter and then F12 to Finish","Scenario: Horses TTC
Given I am logged into the OMNIA terminal
And I have navigated to the translation page
When I accept a bet
Then I translate horses TTC"
C2158347,"1. In Omnia, scan through a plain slip > enter 12.00 stake > Confirm
Note: stake may not be correct as it depends on amount of races left TTC, but that is fine
2. Navigate to Translations, locate the bet and re-enter the stake
3. Press F9 on the keyboard
4. Using the arrows on the keyboard, scroll until you find a Greyhound event and press the space bar on the meeting name
5. With the Selection box now highlighted, press 1 on the keyboard and then enter twice
6. Press F12 on the keyboard > enter on Win > use the arrows to find Single and press enter
7. Press enter and then F12 to Finish","Scenario: Greyhounds TTC
Given I am logged into the OMNIA terminal
When I have navigated to the translation page
And I accept a connect card bet
Then I translate greyhound TTC"
C1106697,"1. In Omnia, scan through a plain slip > enter 10.00 stake > Confirm
2. Navigate to Translations, locate the bet and re-enter the stake
3. In the Time/Location box, type in the race time and press enter when it appears
4. Type 1 in the Selection box and press enter twice
5. Click the QUALIFIERS button at the top right of the screen
6. Click the Banker option
7. Type 2 + 3 + 4 + 6 on the keyboard and press enter twice
You will have to re-enter the race time if it is not still populated in the Time/Location box
8. Press F12 on the keyboard and use the up arrows to highlight Reverse Forecast > press enter
9. Press enter and the F12 to Finish
10. Navigate to Completed Translations and bring up the bet","Scenario: Banker bet
Given I am logged into the OMNIA terminal
When I have navigated to the translation page
Then I accept a bet
And Select slip and enter a stake and set sport
Then I attempt to translate a banker bet
Then I am able to confirm bet has been created"

column1: 2. Enter a stake amount higher/lower than the initial struck amount

Given I am logged into the OMNIA terminal

Then I verify bet type in shop log page
And Find slip from translation list
Then Change stake and reject
Then Change stake and accept
And I verify Total Stake contains currency symbol
And Search for a bet slip
Then Confirm stake has changed
2. Navigate to awaiting translation and locate bet-once located click on the bet
3. Enter the £10 stake.
4. Sport defaulted to horses/greyhounds- type a selection and press enter
5. Enter/Purple + to add to section 1
6. F12/enter to continue to bet type optioning
7. enter the bet as £5 single and add to the section
8. Click add section or + to add a new section.
9. F8- to change sport type to football.
10. Choose a match in Event Box.
11. In market -select match result.
12. Select the home team.
13. Purple + to add to bet slip.
14. F12 /green arrow to journey to bet types.
15. Tranaslate as win-single-£5 and press purple +/enter to add to the section.
16. In section 2 click the edit pencil next to the selection.
17. Tab in the selection box and backspace or delete home team
18. This time select a draw
19. Enter/click green arrow to confirm the change.
20. F12/finish to complete the section.

21. Now check in reverse order, adding the football selection to section 1 and then the horse/greyhound selection in section 2 then after adding a bet to the section 2 edit the selection in section 1.",
C1106846,"1. strike £4 bet
2. Navigate to awaiting translations - when bet located click on it.
3. Enter £4 stake.
4. Translate 2 horses and use enter/purple + to add to section 1.
5. F12/green arrow to move to bet type page.

15. F12/finish to complete translation.

C1106856,"1. Accept a bet for £2 and select the bet from Awaiting Translation and confirm the stake. Add a Selection of your choice in the first section for a £1 Win Single
2. Use the + Key or ADD SECTION and then add a further selection of your choice for a 50p Each Way Single
3. Select Finish/F12/Confirm and then locate the bet in Completed Translations and Select it
4. Use the 3 Dots in Section 1 to bring up the options for Alien/Void/Copy
5. Choose Void Section
6. Confirm the VOID
7. Press Finish/F12/Confirm and then go to Completed Translations
8. Select the bet again from Completed Translations
9. Now Use the 3 dots again in Section 1
10. Choose Alien Section
11. Choose Any Reason and Any Date and add a stake of 1.00 at the final step 3
12. Select to Mark As Alien
13. Press Finish/F12/Confirm and then check for bet in Completed Translations","Scenario: Make Void section to an Alien and Alien section to a Void

C1106616,"1. Accept a bet of £2, and select it in completed translations and confirm the stake
2. Enter any selection from Horses & Greyhounds
3. Use F12/Confirm to proceed to Bet details and select a £1 Win Single and press Enter to add the Bet to the Section
4. Use the + key or choose the Add Section box
5. Use the 3 dots in Section 2 to open up the option to Alien Section
6. Select Alien Section and the Alien Bet process page should start
7. Select UNREADABLE and press Enter/Next
8. Confirm the date as tomorrow by pressing Enter/Next
9. Tap in the Stake box and enter 1.00 and then the Mark As Alien box
10. Press Finish/F12/Confirm
11. Select the bet from the Completed Translations list
12. Press the 3 dots in section 2 to see 3 options
13. Choose VOID section
14. Choose the VOID button
15. Press F12/Finish/Confirm
16. Select the bet again from Completed Translations
17. Use the Pencil next to Section 2, you should get a Bin and a Cross symbol
18. Select the Bin symbol
19. Select YES","Scenario: Should be able to delete a void section via pencil but not add selections/bets

C65411217,"1. Scan through a plain slip  enter any stake  Confirm
2. Navigate to Translations  Awaiting Translation and re-enter the stake on the bet
3. Change the Sport (F8) 'Virtual Racing' from the Sports Drop down
4. Click on the 3 dots from the Top right corner and Select the 'Mark Slip As Alien' or click on the F7 key on the keyboard
5. Click the 'Virtual Racing' section
6. Select the 'Virtual Motor Racing' option and press NEXT
7. Click NEXT again with 'Event not available' set as the default and then MARK AS ALIEN on the next screen with the date on it
Note: the date will default to tomorrow which is fine
8. Click the 'Translations' tab and then the 'Alien' header
9. Toggle on the 'Show All Alien Slips' button

column3: C60329736,1. Take two bets for £1.00 each.

column1: 2. Scan ticket or go to translations, click twice on struck date/time and click on the first of the two slips.
3. Type £1.00 in the stake box and the press F12 or the green circle with a white arrow.
4. Press F9 or click on the purple circle with three white dots on the right hand side of the screen, dropdown appears then click on show race table.
5. Find a horse meeting with at least four races, click on four races and in the selection box put unnamed favourite or a number.
6. Press enter or the purple circle with a white cross and press F12 or the green circle with a white arrow.
7. Under criteria put win, under type put 4-fold, under unit stake put £1.00 and press enter or purple circle with white cross.
8. Note down the order you translated the horses: Press F12 or green rectangle box that has finish (F12) written on it.
9. If you have scanned the bet to translate it will pop back up, if it does not scan the slip again, or click payout, type the slip number and press enter.
10. Click the green manually settle box and check that the order of the horses are the same as you translated them.

11. Repeat steps 2 to 10 but instead translate on dogs and put as £1.00 4 fold.  12. Repeat steps 2 to 10 but instead translate on horses and dogs. Put as a 5p lucky 15 and 25p 4 fold.  ","Scenario: Payout Screen showing the ordering of selections correctly, for horses and dogs

C62129847,"1. Accept a bet with stake of £23 locate bet in awaiting translation and select numbers - Highlight the 6 ball Irish Lotto all 3 draws on the next draw to take place
2. Enter the numbers 1 + 2 + 3 in the selection box
3. Press Enter
4. Proceed to bets using F12 - Confirm
5. Patent is the default bet, change it to Doubles
6. Change the unit stake to £1 and press Enter
7. Now choose Treble as the bet type
8. Change the unit stake to £1 and press Enter to add the Trebles to each section
9. Now change the bet type to Singles
10. Change the unit stake to £1 and press Enter to add the Singles to each section
11. Press + or Add section
12. Press Clear selected event
13. Select a 49's Lunchtime and Teatime 6 ball draw and enter numbers 1 + 49 in the selection box
14. Press enter to add the selections to slip
15. Press F12 Confirm to proceed to bet types
16. Press enter to add bet to slip","Scenario: Numbers - Multiple Bets And Multiple Draws On Same Slip

column3: C65655474,1. Login to OMNIA and go to dashboard

column1: 2. Click on Customer list and go to add customer

8. Click on alias tab and check for the new alias just created","Scenario: Filtering bad word during alias creation from dashboard

C64569829,"1. Accept a bet of £10, locate the bet in Awaiting Translations, select it and confirm the stake
2. In the Selection box enter the number 1, Tab across to the Time/Location and enter the time or location of race, then select SP in the Odds box, do not add to the Betslip at this stage
3. Now select Qualifiers, followed by Banker
4. Then with the Selection box focussed enter the remaining runners via the keyboard 2+3+4+5+6 press Enter then Enter again and these selections will then be added to 5 different sections
5. Then use F12/Confirm/Green Arrow to proceed to Bet Placement
6. Select Straight Forecast as the Bet Type and focus will move to the stake box where a default stake of 2.00 will show, delete this and change the stake to 1.00
7. Press Enter or the purple + to add the bets to each of the 5 sections
8. Now press the + key to add a section

9. In the Selection box enter the number 6, Tab across to the Time/Location and enter the time or location of race (the same as previous bet), then select SP in the Odds box, do not add to the Betslip at this stage
10. Now select Qualifiers, followed by Banker
11. Then with the Selection box focussed enter the remaining runners via the keyboard 1+2+3+4+5 press Enter then Enter again and these selections will then be added to 5 different sections
12. Then use F12/Confirm/Green Arrow to proceed to Bet Placement, Select Straight Forecast as the Bet Type and focus will move to the stake box where a default stake of 1.00 should show
13. Press Enter or the purple + to add the bets to each of the 5 sections and check that all 10 sections have the correct selections and bets

14. Finally press F12/Confirm to complete translation and then check Completed Translations to check the translation and bets are correctly stored","Scenario: Two To Beat the Field in same race on same slip

7. Change the Sport to 'Other Sports' and search for the newly created event.
Search via both 'Event' and 'Selection'.
8. Navigate back to Openbet and suspend the event.
